channel.title: Comments on: Konami is set to ramp up its premium game development with new instalments and remakes for its biggest franchises, including Metal Gear and Castlevania.

item.title: By: jgirondi
item.dc:creator: jgirondi
item.description: Metal Gear will become eStealth, an online base building game that will feature cross-play between console, PC and mobile.
item.content:encoded: Metal Gear will become eStealth, an online base building game that will feature cross-play between console, PC and mobile.
